## How to set up a Python runtime environment for Vivarium.
#
## Create the "vivarium_env" python virtual environment and select it for your project
## directory:
#   cd ~/code/vivarium
#   pyenv local 3.7.3
#   pyenv virtualenv vivarium_env
#   pyenv local vivarium_env
#
## Install NumPy first
#   pip install numpy
#
## Install the packages listed in this file:
#   pip install -r requirements.txt
#   pyenv rehash

Arpeggio
alphashape
cffi
cobra
confluent-kafka
matplotlib
networkx
numpy
parsimonious
Pint
pymongo
pymunk
pytest
pytest-benchmark
scipy
scs
stochastic-arrow>=0.4.3
swiglpk

# Arpeggio>=1.9.1
# cffi>=1.13.2
# cobra>=0.17.1
# confluent-kafka>=0.11.5
# matplotlib>=2.2.2
# networkx>=2.2
# numpy>=1.14.6
# parsimonious>=0.8.1
# Pint>=0.9
# pymongo>=3.6.1
# pymunk>=5.6.0
# pytest>=4.6.5
# pytest-benchmark>=3.2.2
# scipy>=1.2.3
# scs>=2.0.2
# stochastic-arrow>=0.4.2
# swiglpk>=1.4.4
